text: William Whiteley may refer to: * William Whiteley (1831-1907), British entrepreneur, founder of Whiteleys department store in London * William G. Whiteley (1819-1886), United States Representative from Delaware * William Whiteley (politician) (1881-1955), British Labour Member of Parliament for Blaydon in County Durham * William Henry Whiteley (1834-1903), Newfoundland politician *Bill Whiteley, fictional character in British soap opera, Emmerdale
title: William Whiteley (disambiguation)
